name: SpaceBar (potatoBytes, mewmewdevart, smerelo)
description:
*Attention:  We intend to continue with the development of the game but for that it is essential that we know how your experience was when playing, so please, if possible, fill out the form after playing the game.  CLICK HERE  *  😊

In browser and windows:

- Move the manager around with WASD or ↑ ← ↓  →

 - Use 'SPACE'  to motivate your employees and do tasks.

- 'F' for fullscreen.

- 'ESC' to pause

In Android(Mobile):

- Use th joystick to move the manager around

- Use the button on the bottom right corner to motivate your employees and do tasks

Before reading what is written below, how about following us on social media?

Discord | Twitter | Instagram| Facebook | Itch.io | Ko-Fi 

Have you ever wanted to run your very own space canteen? Yell at.. *cough*, encourage you workers to work more efficiently? Today's your lucky day! With Spacebar you can do all of those things, today! Manage your canteen through increasingly difficult situations. your success is in your hands!

Hire Employees to run your SpaceBar!

That Radio sure is loud, I wonder what happens if you click on it?  👀

Click on the order cards at the top of the screen as they come in to get a task assigned(you can only get a task assigned once your current task is completed). 

You can see if the order is currently assigned by looking at the top left corner of the order card.

       

Once you get an order, an arrow will point to where you need to go to get your tasks done

When you are done with your task you can pass your order to the next step of the order process. 

Each color change represents a new step in the order process.

 The  order is being prepared.

 The Order is ready to be served.

 The client has finished eating and the dishes need to be taken to be washed.

At the end of each day, you can hire employees to do the hard work for you. Each employee has it's own stats and can be assigned an area of work at any time.
